scripts.watch:css: PORT=3001 LOAD_PATH=src/styles PATH_TO_MAIN_SCSS=/src/styles/main.scss PATH_TO_DEST_MAIN_CSS=/src/styles/dest node bin/postcss.js
scripts.build:css: PORT=3001 LOAD_PATH=src/styles PATH_TO_MAIN_SCSS=/src/styles/main.scss PATH_TO_DEST_MAIN_CSS=/src/styles/dest/main.css PATH_TO_COMPONENTS=/src/components node bin/postcssBuild.js
